name: Seated Leg Extension with Ruck
cues: Sit on a bench or chair with feet flat on the floor
Place a ruck plate (or dumbbell) across one shin
Extend your leg until almost straight, keeping torso upright and core braced
Repeat for reps, then switch legs
Focus on squeezing your quadriceps at the top
variations: Use a resistance band for added challenge
Perform both legs simultaneously if equipment allows
